original_text: They received from Moses all the gifts that the Israelites had chosen to bring. They had brought gifts that would help to build the tabernacle and the other special things. The Israelites continued to bring more gifts to Moses every morning.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘 자손의 성소의 모든 것을 만들기 위하여 가져온 예물을 모세에게서 받으니라 그러나 백성이 아침마다 자원하는 예물을 연하여 가져왔으므로

sentences.original_text: They received from Moses all the gifts
that the Israelites had chosen to bring
that would help to build the tabernacle
The Israelites continued to bring more gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손들은 더 많은 예물을 가져오는 것을 계속했다
